universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable

Class DrawableWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • universum.studios.android.ui.graphics.drawable.DrawableWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RefreshDrawable, TintDrawable

    public class DrawableWrapper
extends Drawable
implements Drawable.Callback
    A Drawable implementation which can be used to wrap another instance of Drawable.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.graphics.drawable.Drawable

        Drawable.Callback, Drawable.ConstantState

      Creates a new instance of DrawableWrapper which wraps the given drawable.

      • attachCallback

        public void attachCallback()
        Re-attaches this drawable wrapper as Drawable.Callback to the wrapped drawable. This should be called in case when the callback of the wrapped drawable has been since initialization removed by framework, this means that this parent actually has been removed as callback.
